card.add_attr_w_var: To create variations: 1. In the "Attributes" tab, add the attribute(s); 2. Turn on "Used for Variations"; 3. Select attribute terms

field.not_distr_cst: Do not distribute at cost price
field.creator: Creator
field.name: Name
field.files_doc_frm: Files for the formation of documents
field.prefix_pieced: Barcode prefix of the piece product
field.prefix_packed: Barcode prefix of the weight product
field.store_ip: IP address of the online store

error.suppl_not_sel: The supplier is not selected. Enter part of the name of the supplier, and select it from the list
error.price_format: Incorrect format. Up to {{int}} digits in the integer and up to {{fract}} digits in the fractional part are allowed
error.price_format1: Incorrect format. Up to {{cnt}} digits are allowed
error.k_accept_nimber: Only a number from {{num1}} to {{num2}} is allowed
error.field_length: The allowed field length is from {{num1}} to {{num2}}
error.lgn_must_contain: The login must consist of latin letters and numbers, and begin with the letters
error.pwd_must_contain: The password must consist of latin letters and numbers, and begin with the letters
error.prces_not_diff: Regular price and sale price should be different
error.320: Не получено согласие на предоставление услуги
error.340: Данное подключение уже имеет привязанный к нему действующий интернет-магазин
error.350: Превышено максимально допустимое количество интернет-магазинов, которые можно заказать за 24 часа с одного аккаунта
error.351: Превышено максимально допустимое количество интернет-магазинов, которые можно заказать за 24 часа с одного IP-адреса

tip.cancel: Cancel the creation of the document
tip.tip_prnt_menu: Configure the menu that is called when the "Print" button is pressed
tip.tax: Enable if you work with taxes, for example with VAT
tip.tax_included: Enable if the price already contains tax. Otherwise, the tax will be added to the price
tip.no_links: This document has no links with other documents
tip.chk_rgstr_con: Check the connection settings to the sell register
tip.electr_switch: Enable if it is possible to accept non-cash payments with bank cards when paying
tip.p_sh_cat_p: Show all categories containing this product
tip.p_selct_all_c: Select all categories of this branch
tip.p_price_item: Price per unit of products or services
tip.p_copy_price: Copy this price value to all other price types
tip.p_ni_pics_prd: There are no images for this product
tip.p_upload_pict: Upload a picture for the product
tip.p_weig_cd_noc: The weight code cannot be changed. It is generated manually 1 time, its value is selected by the system automatically
tip.p_gen_wg_code: Generate the weight code of the product. The weight code is needed for products that will be sold by weight with printed labels
tip.p_show_his_op: Show the history of operations with the product
tip.p_name_depart: Name of the department or warehouse
tip.p_count_produ: Quantity of products before the operation
tip.p_ch_products: Change of quantity products in this operation
tip.p_cnt_prod_op: Quantity of products as a result of this operation
tip.p_operat_date: Date and time of the operation performed, in relation to your time zone
tip.p_net_cost_op: Cost of products as a result of the operation
tip.p_outofst_as: Auto set product as "Removed from sale" and "Out of stock" in the internet-store after this product has been sold
tip.p_av_net_cost: The average cost of the products obtained from the available quantity in stock, current cost, cost and quantity as a result of the operation with the products
tip.s_autorsrv: Auto reserve products after getting internet store order
tip.trn_if_inside: Enable if it is a transfer within the company
tip.tax_value: The value of the tax as a percentage is from 0 to 99. For example, for a 20% tax, you should enter 20
tip.sh_cat_p: Show all categories containing this document
tip.addr_copy_qj: Copy address data from registration address
tip.addr_copy_q: Copy address data from post address
tip.vat_payer: Enable if this company is a payer of sales taxes (like VAT)
tip.cost_all: The average cost of goods is the same for all departments
tip.cost_each: The average cost of goods is calculated separately for each department
tip.clear_field: Clear the search field, and select a different value
tip.prefix_pieced: The first 2 digits of the EAN-13 barcode. Designed to form the company's internal barcodes for piece goods. Value from 20 to 29
tip.prefix_packed: The first 2 digits of the EAN-13 barcode. Designed to form the company's internal barcodes for weighted goods with coding of their mass. Value from 20 to 29
tip.sort_term: Determines the sort order of the terms on the frontend shop product pages. If using custom ordering, you can drag and drop the terms in this attribute.
tip.virtual: Virtual products are intangible and are not shipped
tip.downloadable: Downloadable products give access to a file upon purchase
tip.alw_backrdr: If managing stock, this controls whether or not backorders are allowed. If enabled, purchases possible with zero quantity.
tip.stock_status: Controls whether or not the product is listed as "in stock" or "out of stock" on the frontend.
tip.sold_indiv: Check to let customers to purchase only 1 item in a single order. This is particularly useful for items that have limited quantity, for example art or handmade goods.
tip.no_reg_price_sel: The regular price in the online store settings of your company is not selected
tip.no_sale_price_sel: The sale price in the online store settings of your company is not selected
tip.purch_note: Enter an optional note to send the customer after purchase.
tip.download_expiry: Enter the number of days before a download link expires, or leave blank.
tip.has_archives: Enable this if you want this attribute to have product archives in your store.
tip.def_creator: Creator by default of created in online store Customers orders
tip.ordrs_dprtmnt: Main department in "Customer's order" document for online store orders
tip.s_dprtmnts: The availability of products in the online store will be determined based on the total number of unreserved products in these departments
tip.ctg_stores: Online stores to which this category and its products belong
tip.variation: Define if the attribute can be used as variation
tip.wp_sites: Wordpress sites with a WooCommerce online store hosted on DokioCRM servers and provided to you. 1 connection needs to be ordered with each site.
tip.connecton: Connection is a module responsible for interaction with the online store (sending, receiving and processing data from the online store)

msg.error_msg: An error occurred during the operation
msg.tr_subj_cngd: This product (or service) is already has the history of operations. This is the reason why the field Subject of trade can't be changed.
msg.doc_num_query: Open the "Document number" field for editing?
msg.doc_num_warn: The document number is assigned by the system automatically. If you want to edit it and at the same time allow the system to generate number in the following documents, please do not use more than 9 digits in the number
msg.num_not_unic: The entered document number is not unique
msg.complet_warn: Do you want to complete this document?
msg.complet_query: After the completeon, the document will become unavailable for editing
msg.cnc_com_warn: Do you want to uncomplete this document?
msg.alr_cnc_com: The completion of this document is already cancelled
msg.cnc_com_err1: As a result of the recalculation of the cost of one of the acceptance products, a negative quantity of this product was obtained at one of the stages of its movement
msg.cnc_com_err2: As a result of the operation, a negative quantity was received in the warehouse of one of the products of the document
msg.cnc_com_succs: The document "{{name}}" has been successfully removed from the completion
msg.there_services: There are services in the products list (at least one)
msg.file_del_qury: Do you want to delete this file?
msg.file_del_warn: The file will not be permanently deleted, it will stay in the library "{{name}}"
msg.ne_perm_creat: Not enough permissions for create document "{{name}}"
msg.cnt_crt_items: Unable to create a document "{{name}}", because there is no product items
msg.pc_cat_name_uq: Category names of the same level must be unique
msg.pc_cat_slug_uq: Category Slug name is not unique
msg.attr_slug_uq: Attribute Slug name is not unique
msg.attr_tr_slug_uq: Translated attribute Slug name is not unique
msg.term_tr_name_uq: Translated term name is not unique
msg.term_tr_slug_uq: Translated term Slug name is not unique
msg.pc_cat_tr_name_uq: Translated category names of the same level must be unique
msg.pc_cat_tr_slug_uq: Translated category Slug name is not unique
msg.res_not_saved: Some items did not have a reserve saved, because it exceeded the ordered or available quantity of products
msg.cant_crte_mor: The document cannot be created. For one or more items, the quantity of products for sale exceeds the available quantity of products
msg.no_pos: Unable to create a document without products items
msg.there_cashbox: The sales register with this factory number (FN) is already in the company's database. The FN must be unique. If there is no sales registers with such a FN in the list of sales registers, check the list of deleted sales registers, and, if necessary, restore the deleted sales register
msg.ne_money: There are not enough cash in the sales register to create a document "{{name}}"
msg.sender_n_comp: The sender document of this internal payment has not been completed
msg.pi_w_oo_compl: Incoming payment with this Debit slip is already completed
msg.pi_w_po_compl: Incoming payment with this Outgoing payment is already completed
msg.user_login_th: A user with this login is already in the system
msg.user_email_th: A user with this e-mail is already in the system
msg.cant_decmp_wd: The document "Withdrawal" is not accessible to cancel the completion. To return money to the sales register, use the documents "Debit slip" and "Depositing"
msg.cant_decmp_dp: The document "Depositing" is not accessible to cancel the completion. To return money from the sales register to the cash room, use the documents "Withdrawal" and "Credit slip"
msg.ne_money_op: There are not enough money to carry out this operation
msg.ne_prod_movng: The quantity of products to be moved in one of the positions is more than the available quantity of products in department
msg.minus_on_dprt: As a result of the operation, a negative available quantity of one of the products in the receiving department was obtained. If part or all of the quantity of products in the receiving department is in reserve, then in order to cancel the completion, it is first necessary to remove the products from the reservation
msg.paym_has_indc: This payment has a completed acceptance document
msg.no_gds_shipmn: The quantity of products in one of the positions is more than the available quantity of products in the department
msg.ne_con_goods: The quantity of products in department for one or more items is not enough to write off
msg.cant_def_accn: Unable to define the bank account for creating document "{{name}}"
msg.cant_def_cbox: Unable to define the cash room for creating document "{{name}}"
msg._cause_comp_d: ", because already there is a completed document "
msg._cause_no_pos: ", because there's no items of products with
msg.cnt_crte_cntpt: Unable to create this document because the counterparty is not selected
msg.doc_mst_be_cmp: To perform this operation, the current document must be completed
msg.prod_list_qry: Do you really want to clean product list?
msg.del_prod_quer: Do you really want to delete "{{name}}"
msg.c_conn_err: Sell register connection error. Requesting an error code...
msg.c_check_plug: Please check that sell register is switched on and plugged to the computer
msg.c_err_not_act: Error: sell register is not activated
msg.c_id_not_fnd: Cash register was not founded by its ID, or default cash register was not selected
msg.c_cnt_get_drvr: Can't get control of driver in 30 seconds. May be it's busy by background tasks. Try this query later
msg.c_no_srvr_cnct: Error: there is no server connection
msg.c_fill_only_crt: This field fill only on adding sell register. It's going automatically when connection testing (button "Connection test")
msg.del_img_f_crd: Do you really want to delete image?
msg.img_will_stay: The image will not be permanently deleted, it will stay in the library "Files"
msg.del_spl_f_crd: Do you really want to delete supplier from product card?
msg.del_bcd_f_crd: Do you really want to delete barcode from product card?
msg.cde_num_query: Do you want to edit this field?
msg.cde_num_warn: The code is assigned by the system automatically. If you want to edit it and at the same time allow the system to generate code in the following documents, please do not use more than 9 digits in the code
msg.forder_sved_suc: The order of fields saved successfully
msg.del_fgroup_q: Do you really want to delete group of fields "{{name}}"?
msg.fgroup_wrning: All its fields, and the corresponding fields in all products containing this group of fields will be deleted
msg.del_fld_q: Do you really want to delete field "{{name}}"?
msg.fld_wrning: This field will be deleted in all products
msg.multplr: Multiplier for reduction to the unit of the metric system
msg.abt_multplr: The multiplier tells the system the ratio of your and international units. For example, the international unit for mass is the kilogram. Then for a ton the multiplier is: 1000, for a kilogram: 1, for a gram: 0.001

msg.addr_copy_q: Do you really want to copy address data from post address?
msg.del_cntct_q: Do you really want to delete Contact Person card?
msg.del_acc_q: Do you really want to delete bank details card?
msg.del_attr_q: Do you really want to remove this attribute from the product card?
msg.del_var_q: Do you really want to remove this variation from the product card?
msg.gen_var_q: Do you really want to generate all possible variations? Warning: All existing variarions will be removed!
msg.pol_change: As a result of choosing this calculation policy, the average cost of products will eventually become different in all departments.
msg.pol_change_: Do you really want to change the calculation policy?
msg.del_acc_t_q: Do you really want to delete template?

msg.cr_cn_oin_oo: Create a counter credit slip for this debit slip
msg.cr_cn_pin_po: Create a counter incoming payment for this outgoing payment
msg.cr_cn_oin_po: Create a counter credit slip for this outgoing payment

msg.del_term_f_attr: Delete this term from the attribute?

msg.no_ctg_stores: This category is not associated with any online store
msg.sku_exists: A product or service with this SKU already exists
msg.one_prod_in_var: Cannot use one product in several variations
msg.no_vars_have_prod: Not all variations contain selected products

msg.vartn_alrd_used_as_vartn: This product is already used as a variation in another product
msg.vartve_prod_try_use_as_vartn: One or more of selected products are variable. Variable product can't be use as a variation
